scripts.bootstrap: yarn install --prod && lerna bootstrap --npm-client yarn && npm run link-preset && echo dont forget to re-run watch!
scripts.link-preset: cd packages/preset-motion && yarn link && cd ../.. && yarn link babel-preset-motion
scripts.web: npm run check-dependencies && cd apps/web && npm start
scripts.build: lerna exec --parallel --ignore @jot/native  --ignore @jot/web --ignore babel-preset-motion -- babel src --out-dir lib -s true
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run build
